## EditorPlugin.insertChild() method

May be provided if the plugin is able to insert additional children

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
insertChild?(state: StateTypeReturnType<S>, { previousSibling, document, }: {
        previousSibling?: string;
        document?: {
            plugin: string;
            state?: unknown;
        };
    }): void;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter                      | Type                                                                           | Description       |
| ------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------------- |
| state                          | StateTypeReturnType&lt;S&gt;                                                   | The current state |
| { previousSibling, document, } | { previousSibling?: string; document?: { plugin: string; state?: unknown; }; } |                   |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
